verse:
जानाम्यहं शेवधिरित्यनित्यं न ह्यध्रुवैः प्राप्यते हि ध्रुवं तत्‌।
ततो मया नाचिकेतश्चितोऽग्निरनित्यैर्द्रव्यैः प्राप्तवानस्मि नित्यम्‌ ॥
meaning: Translation:I understand that Yama, the god of death, is impermanent and cannot be attained through fleeting objects. Therefore, I, Nachiketa, have realized that I have attained the eternal fire through transient substances.

upanishad-org.meaning: I know of treasure that it is not for ever; for not by things unstable shall one attain That One which is stable; therefore I heaped the fire of Nachiketas, and by the sacrifice of momentary things I won the Eternal.
